contentList.content: You have broken your sacred Oath in pursuit of power and ambition. Only darkness remains to fuel you now.
Gold embroidery covers the inside of the tabard, right over the heart: 'By any means necessary, I will fight the Greater Evil, showing no mercy for the wicked.'
Enable and Disable the Oathbreaker tag.
Your one and only companion, a long and thick blade always ready dole out the sentencing of your judgement, which often ends up being annihilation.
Greaves that have been treading on the path of pain for a while now. They reflect your will to endure, ever wandering in search of something that was lost.
Tempered gauntlets that are not much unlike your own hands: cold, hard and bloody.
No longer bound by your oath, you wander the realm enacting your own judgement on its denizens - wicked or just, it is executed with righteous fury nevertheless.
